overview: Attempting to keep its men out of trouble, each U.S. Army Post lists places, such as whore houses, gay bars, bathhouses, and cruising areas "Off Limits." Trouble is, the list also serves as a roadmap for every horny GI looking to get his rocks off. OFF LIMITS follows the paths of twelve hugely hung, hard-humping GI's as they are drawn to forbidden locations and blast off the screen in eight scenes of blistering man sex...hard unrelenting gay sex with handsome, tight, heavily hung lads using a forbidden route mapped out by Uncle Sam!
title: Off Limits!
